text: District 2 is an electoral district in Malta. It was established in 1921. Its boundaries have changed many times but it currently consists of the localities of Il-Birgu, L-Isla, Bormla, Ħaż-Żabbar, Il-Kalkara, Ix-Xgħajra and Il-Fgura. ==Representatives== ===1889-1921: one seat=== {|class="wikitable" !Election !Representative |- |1889 |Sigismondo Savona |- |1892 |Latterio Vallone |- |1895 |Ernesto Manara |- |1898 |Paolo Sammut |- |1900 |Emmanuel Testaferrata Bonnici Axiaq |- |1904 |Paolo Sammut |- |1909 |Emmanuele Said |- |1911 |vacant |- |1912 |G Caruana Mamo |- |1915 |Giuseppe Vassallo |- |1917 |Giov.
